text: Ɗa-yooi kɛ pului zu ga kona saʋagɔ, ɓaa è loo bu alu saʋagɔ laawu, è ɗa ɓizɛ è zili nuiti ba, ti wuzeɠezu è laalɔɠɔma. Ni naa laade, folo saʋagɔ laawu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɗa-yooi loɠa ga ɗɔfɔi, naama volo saʋagɔiti daawu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-geezuɠeelai faa zuɠoloɠologi ɠɛ Izilayɛle yooi zu ná pɛ.› Yiimazeɠe, è naa wo mà, nii nà li, gè bo tèʋe nui ma.»
